title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: NEAR Gains 4.9% as Index Rises From Wednesday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Filecoin (FIL) was also among the top performers, gaining 4.6%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3245.42, up 1.3% (+40.73) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

18 of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: NEAR (+4.9%) and FIL (+4.6%).

Laggards: LTC (-5.9%) and UNI (-3.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index rose 1.3% with 18 of 20 assets trading higher, indicating overall positive market movement.
